<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.24</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Arrays </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Reverses given array by reference (modifies the original array, just like [[resize]]). The alternative syntax can be used to reverse a ANSI [[String|string]]. If Unicode support is desired, see [[forceUnicode]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[reverse]] array </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> array: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[reverse]] string <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3dev</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>2.01</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> string: [[String]] - String to be reversed </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - Reversed string </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_arr = [1,2,3];
[[reverse]] _arr;
[[hint]] [[str]] _arr; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[3,2,1]</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_wordArr = [[toArray]] "gateman";
[[reverse]] _wordArr;
[[hint]] [[toString]] _wordArr; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>nametag</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[reverse]] "treboR";<template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns "Robert"</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
